title: Four Bed Room Luxury House For Sale
details:
This is a 4 Bed Roomed Luxury House built in 10 Perches in Quarry Road.This has 4 Bed Rooms and 4 Bath Rooms.It has a Servants Room and Bath room as well.This house has ground plus two floors.All bath rooms are fitted with hot water facilities..the location is a very highly Residential area and close to leading Banks,Super Markets and the Galle Road.
The Price is negotiable and inspection by appointment only.Only genuine buyers are invited to this Propety.No brokers please.
